Pre-requisites

Want to connect with your customers on WhatsApp using Hellofy? Here’s how you can set it up easily! Let’s go through what you need before starting.

✅ What You Need Before You Begin

1. Facebook Business Manager Account

To use WhatsApp for business, you must have a Facebook Business Manager Account. This helps connect your Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp in one place.
👉 Don’t have one? Create it here: business.facebook.com
You must also have a Facebook Page or Instagram Page for your business.

2. A Business Website

You’ll need a website for your business.
This proves your business is real and lets customers find you online.
It’s also needed to get approval from WhatsApp.

3. A Business Phone Number

Use a phone number that is not already used on WhatsApp.
It must be a business number (not your personal one).
You cannot use this number on the WhatsApp mobile app after you connect it to Hellofy.

🔒 Authentication Steps

Step 1: Verify Your Phone Number

WhatsApp will send a code by call or SMS to confirm your number.
Make sure the number is not in use on another WhatsApp account or by another provider.
Already using the number on the WhatsApp app? You must delete that account first:
Go to WhatsApp settings > Delete my account.
Or, just use a new number for Hellofy’s WhatsApp API.

Step 2: Connect Your Facebook Business Account

Link your Facebook Business Account during setup.
This helps Meta (Facebook) know your business is real and allows a smooth connection.
If you don’t have one, you can create it while setting up on Hellofy.
Reminder: Once connected, you won’t be able to use WhatsApp on that phone number.
Chat history and contacts from your phone will not move to Hellofy.
Want to switch back later? Contact Hellofy support anytime!

🌐 Your Website Must Have

To get WhatsApp API access approved, your website must include:

  • Your Business Info – Name, logo, phone, email, address
  • About Us – Who you are and what your business does
  • Privacy Policy – How you protect customer data
  • Terms of Service – Your business rules and conditions
  • Customer Support Details – Show you care about helping your customers

👍 That’s It!

Once all this is ready, Hellofy will help you connect your WhatsApp number and start chatting with your customers like a pro 🚀
Need help? Our support team is just a message away 💬
